name: Adient plc
description: Adient plc is a global leader in automotive seating, providing innovative solutions for vehicle manufacturers and enhancing the driving experience for consumers. Established in 2016 as a spin-off from Johnson Controls International, Adient specializes in designing, engineering, and manufacturing seating systems and components for a diverse range of vehicles, including passenger cars, trucks, and SUVs. The company operates in over 30 countries with a workforce of approximately 75,000 employees, showcasing its extensive reach and expertise in the automotive sector. Adient is committed to delivering high-quality, comfortable, and safe seating products, leveraging advanced materials and technologies to meet the evolving demands of the automotive industry. With a strong focus on sustainability, Adient strives to minimize its environmental impact through efficient manufacturing processes and innovative product designs. The company aims to support automotive manufacturers in their efforts to improve fuel efficiency, reduce emissions, and enhance vehicle safety. Through strategic partnerships and continuous investment in research and development, Adient is positioned to adapt to the changing landscape of the automotive market, including trends towards electrification and autonomous driving. Adient's mission is to lead the future of automotive seating by providing solutions that prioritize comfort, safety, and sustainability.
